job_tasks.phrase: responsible for enhancing the customer developer experience across the inner and outer development loops, ensuring seamless integration with tools, CI/CD workflows, and automation frameworks
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the need to understand how developers work and to align technical solutions (integrations, workflows) with business goals (developer velocity, collaboration, productivity).

job_tasks.phrase: Define and execute the vision for the developer ecosystem, prioritizing features and integrations that improve developer velocity, collaboration, and productivity.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding business objectives (improving developer velocity, collaboration, productivity) and translating them into a strategic vision and prioritized roadmap.

job_tasks.phrase: Gather insights from developers, iterate on feedback, and advocate for features that reduce friction in building, testing, and deploying data applications on Databricks.
job_tasks.justification: This describes understanding customer needs (developer insights) and translating them into product features that align with business goals (reducing friction, improving development process).

job_tasks.phrase: Drive improvements in Databricks Asset Bundles (DABs), IDE integrations, CLI and SDK enhancements, CI/CD workflows, automation frameworks, and testing tools to enhance the inner loop development experience.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves improving developer tools and workflows which are integral parts of software development processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure Databricks integrates seamlessly with third-party developer tools (GitHub, GitLab, Jenkins, Terraform, etc.), enabling efficient DevOps and MLOps workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This involves ensuring compatibility and integration with various software development and operations tools.

job_tasks.phrase: enabling efficient DevOps and MLOps workflows.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of MLOps workflows directly falls under operations engineering for ML/GenAI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Our customers require enterprise grade software best practices for their teams and this team delivers on that mission.
job_tasks.justification: This statement reflects an understanding of customer business needs (enterprise-grade software best practices) and aligning the team's mission to meet them.

job_tasks.phrase: You have a deep understanding of developer workflows, cloud infrastructure, CI/CD best practices, and the evolving landscape of data and AI development to drive meaningful impact across Databricks' developer community.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need for business context (developer workflows, CI/CD, data/AI landscape) to achieve business impact.

job_tasks.phrase: Metrics & Observability - Define and track key success metrics around developer adoption, engagement, and efficiency to continuously refine the developer experience.
job_tasks.justification: Defining and tracking metrics is a key aspect of understanding business performance and iterating based on business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaboration & Stakeholder Management - Work closely with engineering, developer relations, solution architects, and external partners to drive adoption of Databricks as a best-in-class development platform.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding and managing stakeholders to achieve business objectives (driving adoption).

job_tasks.phrase: Solid understanding of cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP)
job_tasks.justification: Understanding cloud infrastructure is a foundational aspect of data engineering and data platform operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Strong data analysis and operationalization skills (SQL, Python, building operational dashboards)
job_tasks.justification: Data analysis and operationalization are key components of data engineering, preparing data for use and building systems around it.

job_tasks.phrase: evolving landscape of data and AI development
job_tasks.justification: While not directly building models, understanding the AI development landscape implies knowledge of modeling techniques and their application.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with engineering, developer relations, solution architects, and external partners
evolving landscape of data and AI development
improve developer velocity, collaboration, and productivity
reduce friction in building, testing, and deploying data applications
Define and execute the vision for the developer ecosystem
drive adoption of Databricks as a best-in-class development platform

classification.rationale: This role is for a Product Manager, not an engineering role directly building or deploying AI models. While it involves understanding developer ecosystems and AI development, the core responsibilities are product strategy, roadmap definition, and enhancing developer experience, rather than hands-on AI development or MLOps.
